name: Aikakauslehtien liitto ry
goal: Promotion of Finnish magazine media through events, education, research, marketing as well as legislative lobbying. Finnish Periodical Publishers' Association FPPA is member of European Magazine Media Association EMMA and World Magazine Media Federation FIPP.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Environment, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market, copyright, data protection, consumer policy, freedom of expression.
